com.smartnsoft.droid4me.cache

Class Values.Caching

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.cache.Values.Caching
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Values.CachedMap, Values.CachedValue
    Enclosing class:
    Values

    public abstract static class Values.Caching
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a common class for all "cacheables", i.e. Values.CacheableValue and Values.BackedCachedMap, so that we can register them.
    Since:
    2010.06.25

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Values.Caching() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void empty()
      Is supposed to empty the underlying cached value(s).
      static void emptyAll()
      Empties all Values.Caching instances.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • Values.Caching

        protected Values.Caching()

    • Method Detail

      • empty

        public abstract void empty()
        Is supposed to empty the underlying cached value(s). Invoking #isEmpty() afterwards will return true

      • emptyAll

        public static void emptyAll()
        Empties all Values.Caching instances.
